quote: It occurred to her that all the bad parts of life, the sad parts, the frightening ones, were meant to be offset by moments and memories like this. She had to be present in it, right here, right now.
quote_letters: IT OCCURRED TO HER THAT ALL THE BAD PARTS OF LIFE THE SAD PARTS THE FRIGHTENING ONES WERE MEANT TO BE OFFSET BY MOMENTS AND MEMORIES LIKE THIS SHE HAD TO BE PRESENT IN IT RIGHT HERE RIGHT NOW
